item.description:
Ok, going to try and post this with a little more notice this time since there was some interest.

 

Sunday afternoon is a great time for less experienced skiers to go because the mountain offers a deal on the lift ticket for $25 from noon to 4 (and honestly I'm shot after four hours anyway), and we can get rentals nearby for about $25. It's an inexpensive as downhill skiing gets around here.

 

I'm not great at skiing, I usually do mostly blues with some green thrown in, no black. If you have no experience I'm fine hanging on the greens and showing you a thing or two (no experience required).

 

I have a car and would like to carpool (I'm in somerville), we would have to leave town around 8:00 AM to give time for stops for food and rental.

 

My number is 857 998-9005 if you have questions or if you need to reach me to coordinate.
item.how_to_find_us: I drive a silver 2 door Honda civic and have curly brown hair (see picture)
item.name: Beginner/intermediate ski at Loon
